name: EARTH PROTECTOR (SenpaiZero)
description:
meteorites paths and the world government gave you the
task of saving the planet earth from meteorite attacks. Controls: -Press A & D to move the shield around the earth 
-Move mouse and left click to use and shoot the gun
-Q, W, E, R keys are used for upgrading abilities Made for ScoreSpace#17 Jam
Rules: A Highscore Feature is a must Theme: Protector
